name: BWM Dentsu
description: BWM Dentsu was born in 1996 by founders Rob Belgiovane, Paul Williams and Jamie Mackay. A creative, a suit and a planner with one driving ambition, to offer clients an alternative to the big, ponderous multi-national agencies which are the antithesis to innovation and fresh thinking. Our unique strategic and creative process helps objectively determine the most effective focus for our clientsâ€™ brands across all channels.
